Lab1.Title: Heat Transfer in Cooking
Lab1.Description: Conduct experiments to understand the principles of heat transfer in different cooking methods. Prepare a detailed lab report highlighting the physics involved in each cooking technique.

Lab2.Title: Fluid Dynamics in Sauces
Lab2.Description: Explore the role of fluid dynamics in sauce preparation. Conduct experiments with various sauces to analyze viscosity and flow. Present findings in a comprehensive lab report.

Project.Title: Physics of Food Innovation
Project.Description: Develop a project showcasing an innovative application of physics principles in food preparation. This could include a unique cooking technique, equipment design, or molecular gastronomy concept. Present the project and its scientific basis.
